xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/320244-Echo And The Bunnymen: Live in Liverpool 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7Tl1Xk3sF0rNR6EHId7NxqDif5h.jpg On two magical evenings in August 2001, Ian McCulloch and Will Sargeant, founding fathers of the punk darlings Echo and the Bunnymen, joined their current bandmates for a special live performance at Paul McCartney's Liverpool Institute for the Performing Arts. The result is this stunning video (featuring 21 live tracks and 4 bonus videos) that's sure to resonate with the band's loyal, dedicated and fervent fan base. Echo And The Bunnymen: Live in Liverpool
